title: An epytaphe, or a lamentable discourse wherein is bewayled the death of the right worshipfull knight, Sir William Garrat: one of the Queens Maiesties commissioners, and chiefe alderman of the honourable citie of London. Who deceased the. 27. of September. 1571.
author: Phillips, John, fl. 1570-1591.
publicationStmtPublisher: In the vpper end of Fleetelane: by Richarde Iohnes, and are to be sould at his shop, ioynyng to the southwest doore of sainct Paules Churche,
